thread.title: Lewandowski arrives for meeting with House panel on Russia

title: Lewandowski arrives for meeting with House panel on Russia
text:
Lewandowski arrives for meeting with House panel on Russia 2:24am IST - 00:10 
President Donald Trump's former campaign manager Corey Lewandowski arrived Wednesday for his closed-door meeting with the House Intelligence Committee as part of the investigation into alleged Russian meddling in the 2016 U.S. election. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
President Donald Trump's former campaign manager Corey Lewandowski arrived Wednesday for his closed-door meeting with the House Intelligence Committee as part of the investigation into alleged Russian meddling in the 2016 U.S. election. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/01/17/lewandowski-arrives-for-meeting-with-hou?videoId=386754369&videoChannel=13423
